title_narrative: Technical Assistance under the South-South Cooperation with the People`s Republic of China in Support of the Agricultural Sector Strategic Plan in the Republic of Uganda (Phase 3)
description_narrative: Increase and improve provision of goods and services from agriculture, forestry and fisheries in a sustainable manner and enable more inclusive and efficient agricultural and food systems at local, national and international levels
